Help: Time-Machine: Jazz Age Edition Opportunity cards

types.Help: Advance to the occupation named as 'destination'. Player enters immediately.
Advance to the occupation chosen by the player. Player enters immediately.
Advance to the border square named as 'destination'. Subsequent player action depends on the landing square.
Advance to any border square chosen by the player. Subsequent player action depends on the landing square.
Non-movement player action. There are three action types: extra_turn, leave_unemployment, collect_experience.
Advance to the nearest Amtrak station and roll again.
Advance to the nearest Opportunity space and roll again.

cards.text: OPPORTUNITY to become a Bootlegger. Meet Normal Requirements.
OPPORTUNITY to work at Sapphire Records. Meet Normal Requirements.
OPPORTUNITY to join Radio Station KWDB. Meet Normal Requirements.
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to join Radio Station KWDB because of your engineering background. All expenses paid and no prior experience required.
OPPORTUNITY to work in the Stork Club. Meet Normal Requirements.
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY for membership in the Stork Club because of your insider connections. All expenses paid and no prior experience required.
OPPORTUNITY to join Paul Whiteman's Orchestra. Meet Normal Requirements.
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to in Paul Whiteman's Orchestra because of your stride piano skills. DOUBLE all Happiness earned. Meet Normal Requirements.
OPPORTUNITY to join the Chicago Outfit. Meet Normal Requirements
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to join the Chicago Outfit because of your mob connections. All expenses paid and no prior experience required.
OPPORTUNITY to attend a show at Cotton Club. Meet Normal Requirements
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to work at the Cotton Club because the owner likes your style. All expenses paid and no prior experience required.
OPPORTUNITY to join a Major League Baseball team. nMeet Normal Requirements
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to join a Major League Baseball team because of your great on base percentage. All expenses paid and no prior experience required.
OPPORTUNITY to attend Roosevelt College. Meet Normal Requirements.
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to attend Roosevelt College on Scholarship, all expenses paid.
OPPORTUNITY to be a Prohibition Agent. Meet Normal Requirements
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to be a Prohibition Agent because of your crime fighting spirit. All expenses paid.
GOLDEN  OPPORTUNITY to join the Profession of your choice. Meet Normal Requirements.
GOLDEN  OPPORTUNITY to advance to ANY border square. Meet normal requirements for Profession or College entrance*
OPPORTUNITY to buy protection from the Mob. Advance to Buy Protection and pay $5,000 premium.
OPPORTUNITY to vacation at Coney Island!
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to collect needed cash! Advance to PAYDAY and collect DOUBLE your annual salary.
OPPORTUNITY to bet on the ponies at Pimlico.
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to buy needed padding! Advance to EXPERIENCE square and buy at least 1 and up to 3 EXPERIENCE cards.
TRAVEL OPPORTUNITY Advance to the nearest rail Station and roll again.
OPPORTUNITY KNOCKS. Advance to the nearest OPPORTUNITY square and roll again
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to gain EXPERIENCE! Collect one randomly selected EXPERIENCE card from each player.
Get out of Unemployment free. Play this card to immediately leave Unemployment.
SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to Get an Extra Turn. Play at the start of your turn.
